main event: On June 25, 1955, an unidentified flying object was observed in the sky over Hillcrest Heights, Maryland, exhibiting erratic motion and bright illumination.
interesting points: The object was described as yellowish and very brilliant with a trail 4 to 5 times its length,There was no sound associated with the object during its observation,The sighting lasted approximately 7 minutes,It was reported that at times the object oscillated and then moved off at high speed,The observer remarked that no comparison could be made with known aircraft due to its unique characteristics.
sighted object: a yellowish, bright object with a long trail
witness description: Civilians, including an administrative assistant, who observed the object from their driveway.
